product_name: REI Marine Animal Reversible Bucket Hat - Infant/Toddler Boys'
long_description: The REI Marine Animal Reversible Bucket Hat is 2 hats in 1; choose whichever side matches your child's mood. Lightweight and collapsible, this hat stows easily in a pocket or purse. Cotton is soft, breathable and comfortable. Rip-and-stick chin strap secures the hat in a breeze. The REI Marine Animal Reversible Bucket Hat includes a small pocket with rip-and-stick flap closure.
short_description: The REI Marine Animal Reversible Bucket Hat is 2 hats in 1; choose whichever side matches your child's mood.
